trans-unit.resname: JMP·1 | Blessed Sanctuary | Card Name
JMP·1 | Blessed Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 防止将对你和由你操控之生物造成的所有非战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·1 | Blessed Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Unicorn creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个2/2白色独角兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·2 | Brightmare | Card Name
JMP·2 | Brightmare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap up to one target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置至多一个目标生物。你获得等同于该生物力量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·3 | Emiel the Blessed | Card Name
JMP·3 | Emiel the Blessed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}: Exile another target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: {3}：放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·3 | Emiel the Blessed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If it's a Unicorn, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. ({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付{G/W}。若你如此作，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若它是独角兽，则改为在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。（{G/W}可用{G}或{W}来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·4 | Release the Dogs | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·7 | Supply Runners | Card Name
JMP·7 | Supply Runners | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在每个由你操控的其他生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·18 | Witch of the Moors | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 官方翻译于OTC（2024-04-19）；非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·18 | Witch of the Moors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nAt the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, each opponent sacrifices a creature and you return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 死触在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中获得过生命，则每位对手各牺牲一个生物，且你将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
trans-unit.note: 官方翻译于OTC（2024-04-19）；非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·19 | Chained Brute | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·20 | Immolating Gyre | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·21 | Lightning Phoenix | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·22 | Lightning Visionary | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·23 | Living Lightning | Card Name
JMP·23 | Living Lightning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·24 | Muxus, Goblin Grandee | Card Name
JMP·24 | Muxus, Goblin Grandee | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top six cards of your library. Put all Goblin creature cards with mana value 5 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的六张牌。将其中所有法术力值等于或小于5的鬼怪生物牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·24 | Muxus, Goblin Grandee | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Muxus attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other Goblin you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当穆克斯攻击时，你每操控一个其他鬼怪，它便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·25 | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Name
JMP·25 | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个非衍生物的牛头怪在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个2/3红色牛头怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·25 | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{B/R}:直到回合结束，由你操控的牛头怪得+1/+0且获得威慑与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·26 | Spiteful Prankster | Card Name
JMP·26 | Spiteful Prankster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, CARDNAME has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，CARDNAME便具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·26 | Spiteful Prankster | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物死去时，CARDNAME对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·27 | Zurzoth, Chaos Rider | Card Name
JMP·27 | Zurzoth, Chaos Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws their first card each turn, if it's not their turn, you create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓每回合中他的第一张牌时，若当前不是他的回合，则你派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: JMP·27 | Zurzoth, Chaos Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Devils you control attack one or more players, you and those players each draw a card, then discard a card at random.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个魔鬼攻击一位或更多牌手时，你和这些牌手各抓一张牌，然后各随机弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·28 | Allosaurus Shepherd | Card Name
JMP·28 | Allosaurus Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·28 | Allosaurus Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Green spells you control can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的绿色咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·28 | Allosaurus Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, each Elf creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 and becomes a Dinosaur in addition to its other creature types.
trans-unit.target: {4}{G}{G}：直到回合结束，每个由你操控的妖精生物之基础力量与防御力均为5/5，且都额外具有恐龙此生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·29 | Branching Evolution | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 官方翻译于PIP（2024-03-08）；非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·29 | Branching Evolution | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在该生物上放置该数量两倍的+1/+1指示物。
trans-unit.note: 官方翻译于PIP（2024-03-08）；非官方翻译于legacy card name（2024-02-28）

trans-unit.resname: JMP·33 | Thriving Bluff | Card Name
JMP·33 | Thriving Bluff | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·33 | Thriving Bluff | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。

trans-unit.resname: JMP·33 | Thriving Bluff | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

JMP·34 | Thriving Grove | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·34 | Thriving Grove | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种绿色以外的颜色。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

JMP·35 | Thriving Heath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·35 | Thriving Heath | Card Text | Paragraph 2

JMP·36 | Thriving Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·36 | Thriving Isle | Card Text | Paragraph 2

JMP·37 | Thriving Moor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
JMP·37 | Thriving Moor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
